Text:
so far no problems but one Ep.6 sound only comes out of the Right Speaker, but aside from that Good quality good sound, Fast Download

A=9
V=10
ok Update here , Ep 11 and 12 will not work for me, im not sure if the video's don't work or my computer wont run.

I fucking hate people that say video is 10 when at least half the episodes are all pixely.

Audio: 10, perfect.
Video: 6, most episodes all fuzzy.

Epi 6 confirmed to not have sound in left channels. Epis 11 and 12 also will not work (I am using VLC.)

Subs: 10 (if anyone was wondering.)
Audio: 10
Video: 9
I didn't have much of any issues with pixely artifacts, just the missing segments (I watched epi 6, 11, 12 elsewhere..)
also, anime itself was excellent. Highly recommended!

What a shame, the first 4 or 5 episodes are AWESOME quality for the size, then everyone after that is pixelated to hell. Am I doing something wrong? Using MPC with all the codecs, it isn't any better in VLC either...

Love the show, had no problems downloading or watching (so far)...

...great torrent!
I'm not above reading my shows and i have before but i was wondering if there were dubs?
